sentences.tran: 对汤姆和特伦特来说，这只是个设置在舞台上的陷阱。
sentences.tranLocal: For Tom and Trent, the trap demonstration was a setup on a stage.

sentences.tran: 特伦特希望该技术可以作为一种开源的解决方案在公司间共享。
sentences.tranLocal: Trent would like to see the technology spread among companies as an open-source solution.
